I

InboundPortI - Interface in fr.upmc.components.ports
The interface InboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming calls from client components towards the service providers.
initialise() - Method in class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
initialise the RMI registry reference for JVM that are not responsible for its creation.
initialise() - Method in interface fr.upmc.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
initialise the CVM (mainly the RMI registry, when necessary).
instantiateAndPublish() - Method in class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
simply establish that the instantiation of components and the publication of the entry points are completed, so it should be called at the end of the user's own instantiateAndPublish method.
instantiateAndPublish() - Method in interface fr.upmc.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
instantiate all of the local static components and publish the ports for connections in the registry.
interconnect() - Method in class fr.upmc.components.cvm.AbstractDistributedCVM
simply check if instantiation of components and the publication of the entry points are completed, so it should be called at the beginning of the user's own interconnect method.
interconnect() - Method in interface fr.upmc.components.cvm.DistributedComponentVirtualMachineI
connects the components on the current site and with components on other sites through the registry.

isConcurrent() - Method in interface fr.upmc.components.ComponentI
